snippet.title: Let's Play Smoothie Galaxy
snippet.description:
Made for a 48-hour Game-Maker game jam, Smoothie Galaxy is a bit of run and gun zelda action. You play a spacenaut crashed on an unknown planet and you need to find fours pieces of ship scattered in the world, for repair your ship and escape the planet.

You can play it here:
https://pixel-boy.itch.io/smoothie-galaxy
